description: Turn a classic caesar salad into a pasta salad, complete with crispy bacon and crunchy sourdough, that's worthy of praise.
name: Caesar Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange cos leaves in bowls. Toss pasta and half each of the bacon and parmesan in a large bowl until combined. Divide among bowls, then top with egg and remaining bacon and parmesan. Season with pepper, scatter over chives and serve drizzled with dressing.
